= Routing: A(star) algorithm =
----
Some open source project uses a common algorithm to find the best way in a graph.
For each node, it should search for an "optimistic" subsequent node. We notice which algorithm to use form a J2ME project, [http://www.getjar.com/products/8324/VGPS VGPS]
